markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 7"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Impeccable Crafting](/Feats.aspx?ID=792) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="General" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=78" />
<trait label="Skill" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=144" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 262 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

**Prerequisites**
Master in [Crafting](/Skills.aspx?ID=4); [Specialty Crafting](/Feats.aspx?ID=844)

</column>

---

You craft flawless creations with great efficiency. Whenever you roll a success at a Crafting check to make an item of the type you chose with Specialty Crafting, you get a critical success instead.
name: Impeccable Crafting

<traits>
<trait label="General" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=78" />
<trait label="Skill" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=144" />
</traits>

<additional-info>
<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 262 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

**Prerequisites**
Master in [Crafting](/Skills.aspx?ID=4); [Specialty Crafting](/Feats.aspx?ID=844)

</additional-info>

---

<summary>
Craft items more efficiently.
</summary>
text: <title level="1" right="Feat 7" pfs="Standard" > Impeccable Crafting Source Core Rulebook pg. 262 4.0 Prerequisites Master in Crafting; Specialty Crafting --- You craft flawless creations with great efficiency. Whenever you roll a success at a Crafting check to make an item of the type you chose with Specialty Crafting, you get a critical success instead.
